QuestData.Title: Extrinsic Motivation
QuestData.Description: The Shattered Hand are nae strangers tae pain. They each cut off their own hand as a sign o' their allegiance to Kargath.$B$BIf you're going tae get the information we need, it might take more than my poison.$B$BSlaughter them all. We'll see how far they're willing tae go fer their beloved warlord.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shattered Sightless, $2oa Shattered Harvesters, and $3oa Shattered Blood-Singer.
QuestData.CompletionText: These orcs are soulless brutes. They canna be reasoned with.
